Trying out 2D first

```{r algorithm}

swarm <- function(lower, upper,omega,phiP,phiG,f){
  
  best_swarm <- lower
  
  #for each particle i 
  for (i in 1:S){
    #initial position
    x[i] <- runif(1,lower,upper)
    p[i] <- xi
    
    if(f(p[i]) < f(best_swarm)){
      best_swarm <- p[i]
    }
    
    #initial velocity
    v[i] <- runif(1,-abs(upper-lower),abs(upper-lower))
  }
  
  
  
}


```
